article_title: Gaza’s top Islamic scholar issues fatwa criticising 7 October attack

sentence: Israel  responded  by  launching  a  military  campaign  to  destroy  Hamas,  during  which  more  than  43,400  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
